parameters:
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Hey there, Segi-san. If there's anything in our stock that
can be of use to you, feel free to take it without
hesitation.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>...It's a promise, okay? If you break the promise, I have my
ways of dealing with it, so make sure you remember that.
\N<Segi>...I have to go to the management office.
\N<Segi>I-I need to get the medicine... I must go get it quickly!
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Where are you going, ma'am?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>What's with the surprise? It's only natural, you can't just
silently walk past me, can you?
\N<Segi>Wh-What are you doing? Please let me through...

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>If you want to pass, then keep me company, okay? You haven't
forgotten about last time, have you? Surely you're not
planning to act like a stranger after all that?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>If that's the case, it's rather cold of you, considering our
relationship.
\N<Segi>Our relationship, what are you talking about...?

\N<Segi>I don't know... I don't understand what you're saying, but
please stop this strange accusation.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Is that so? Then let's see if it's a false accusation or
not.
\N<Segi>Stop... What are you... Let go of me.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Heh heh, look at that. As I thought, ma'am, you're the one
from that time... Once I've seen this body, how could I
forget it?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>So will you admit it? That you're the woman who made love
with me that time.
\N<Segi>That's not true! I didn't do anything like that...!
\N<Segi>I don't know who you're mistaking me for...! Please stop!

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Heh heh, playing innocent, are you? If that's what you want,
I don't mind.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>I'll spread the word around town. That you've been
neglecting your husband and son to hang around at Fubii's
place.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Everyone will be shocked, for sure. They'd never expect it
from you... And at the same time, all the men in town will
be eager to volunteer to be with you.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>It'll be too late by then. It won't just be Fubii or me
anymore. The whole town will start aiming for you.

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>So what do you say? Changed your mind? Will you admit to
that night and keep me company?
\N<Weapon Shop Owner>Heh heh... Make sure to follow through later... okay?

\N<Weapon Shop Owner>...It's a promise, okay? If you break it, I have my ways
too. Just remember that.
